primary.title: Download the Package Tracker app for iOS and Android

items.question: How do I use a Circuit package tracker?
items.answer: You will need the tracking number your store or courier service has sent in a confirmation email or SMS. Pop your tracking number into the search box and hit 'Track my package'. You will know what delivery stage your package is at and where in the world it is. Plus the estimated arrival time if we have this information.

items.question: How long does it usually take to deliver an international package?
items.answer: This depends on your shipping type and how far your package needs to travel. Your package will usually take between two weeks and a month for economy-level service from another country. If you choose premium service from the exact location, your package could arrive in as little as two days. Delays in shipping may also result from delays in the company processing your order. You will get an email or SMS from your courier service when your package is shipped. You should reach out to your courier service for more details if you're unsure whether your package has been sent.

items.question: What do I do if I haven't received my package?
items.answer: You should contact the company where you ordered the goods with your package or purchase details, including your tracking number.
